name: THE ULTIMATE TRUTH PREACHING MISSION

address: SHANTI NIKETAN BOUDDHA VIHARA,TUICHAWNG, DISTRICT:LUNGLEI, STATE:MIZORAM,INDIA.

briefDescription: Organisation Profile :1.	The organization “ THE ULTIMATE TRUTH PREACHING MISSION “ was formed on 16.10.1996. It was registered under No. SR/MZ-86 dated 29th March 2000 under societies registration act 1860, government of mizoram, aizawl. The memorandum of association and rules and regulation was revised u/s 18 of the mizoram societies registration act 2005.2.	At present, the main activities, we have under taken are :(a)	Running ‘AHIMSA ENGLISH SCHOOL’ since the year 2000. The total enrolment in the current academic session has gone upto 64 from classes kg-1 to Class-IV. Most of the children are from BPL family.(b)	We run a ‘CHAKMA TRIBAL HANDICRAFT PROJECT’ sponsored by the Development Commissioner, Handicrafts, Ministry of Textiles, G
